But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa

programme.title: Oceans Africa

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Hustler
programme.desc: George is an excellent pool player and has in fact, established a reputation in the field of billiards. Later, he decided to take advantage of his talent and used the sport as a source of living.

programme.title: Ikaw at Ako at Ang Ending
programme.desc: When a bagman meets a hotelkeeper, he knows she's the one. To hide and start anew, they go to the northernmost part of the country where an unexpected end awaits them.

programme.title: Who's That Girl?
programme.desc: A one-of-a-kind romantic-comedy movie about a girl who is an alleged mistress of a business tycoon, husband to Eugene Domingo's character,and father to Luis Manzano's character.

programme.title: Diary ng Panget
programme.desc: Eya (Nadine Lustre) and Cross (James Reid) didn't get along at first, their relationship becomes complicated but soon, they fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: This is a story of Samantha Perez (Nadine Lustre), a girl who unbelievably fell in love with a delinquent, hot-headed guy named Timothy Odelle Pendleton aka Top (James Reid), the leader of the gang, Lucky 13.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Christmas
programme.desc: Ethan, always the nice guy, wakes up in a new reality at Christmas. Initially, he is enthralled with his new life but soon realizes that it's not what he thought it would be.

programme.title: CSI S4 E08 - After The Show
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S1 E24 - Weird Science
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E19 - Frasier Gotta Have It
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E02 - The Odyssey
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.desc: We've all got a sweet tooth, and whether you love Twizzlers or Gummy Bears, host Peyton Manning takes us through the top ten candies of all time.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The world is full of stunning natural phenomena that are so strange they defy conventional wisdom. Can science explain Earth's mysteries? Or does human knowledge of the Earth only scratch the surface?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)

programme.desc: Subukan Kami Kung Kaya Nyo

programme.desc: Tikboy at Pamboy

programme.title: Alex Boncayao Brigade

Meanwhile, the military also mounts an operation to capture the brigade. When will both sides realize that in war, there can be no winners and losers.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko

programme.title: Oplan Baleleng

programme.title: Mauna Ka... Susunod Ako!

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.desc: Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Darington has built the ultimate stunt-track, and every Monster Machine in town is coming to see the show! But when a jealous Crusher tricks Darington and sends him far, far away, it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Café Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! // Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but he's lost! Dora and Boots have to get him to the show on time.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: After Vigo zaps Fishy Force with his Power Stealing Ray, everyfishy's superpowers get swapped! // Penny Piranha makes up new rules so she never loses at shore shore.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 9
programme.desc: The score of a lifetime is hidden in the back of what already appears to be a great locker, but when the bidding heats up, will our auction heroes have the cash to stay in this game? But first, Brandon and Lori face a shocking discovery when the contents of what look like an old retail store reveal their true identity. And later, some rare antiques fetch a fair price but further exploration of a hidden whale tusk could mean a windfall for one lucky storage hunter.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 1
programme.desc: Old rivals unite when Brandon and Jesse are faced with the unthinkable: join forces or stand alone to gamble on a once-in-a-lifetime locker. Then, a vintage motorcycle and rare car parts create big cash for one of our slickest auction heroes. And later, the Taylor Brothers are in for the fight of their lives when they leave the Deep South for the promise of California gold. It's an old-world battle that could lead to a new world order.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 10
programme.desc: The spotlight shines on 20 of the Worlds Dumbest Performers. From an underwear clad girl giving a sobriety test, to amateur firework technicians, plus a funeral home Christmas greeting that will send shivers down your spine - these dumb performers shine in the roles they were born to play. Plus, awesome commentary from our cast of comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 5
programme.desc: Clark and General Lane are both having a hard time giving Lois room to make her own decisions.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 11
programme.desc: When jumbo-sized containers make their way to the yard, buyers use every trick in the book to win, big time. Plus, Mo and Ty feel the need for speed, but will their huge bet pay off?

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Better Off Zed
programme.desc: A lazy man in his thirties is happy to sit out the zombie apocalypse in his fortified suburban abode, until his wife acts on a more pragmatic strategy for survival, forcing him to become a zombie killer!

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Cry No Fear
programme.desc: Two half-sisters are always at each other's throats. However, when they are left alone in their house during a raging storm and encounter ruthless intruders who try to kill them, they have no choice but to team up in order to escape.

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S7)
programme.desc: The participants press Sheriff Scandrett and his team on the difficult conditions they endured during their time in the Henry County Jail, and Shaquille O'Neal makes a surprise appearance.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: When newlyweds are prevented from disembarking on a day trip due to suspected passport forgery, their relationship begins to unravel. Bigamy leads to bloodshed, and a hand gun is smuggled on board.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: In February 2009, 14-year-old Amber Dubois vanishes while walking to school. A year later, detectives are no closer to finding Amber when 17-year-old Chelsea King disappears while jogging.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 24th September 2019, 20-year-old Tashan Daniel is on his way to watch his beloved Arsenal FC play Nottingham Forest, but a brutal attack at the train station ends the talented athlete's hopes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: A deadly house fire claims the life of a family, investigators suspect foul play, and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: 1975: KL Under Siege
programme.desc: In August 1975, terrorists stormed the AIA Building in Kuala Lumpur to demand the release of their comrades, taking 50 hostages including the US Consul.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: The Arvida heritage site in Saguenay is home to houses which tell a whole story. Gatineau matchstick houses are becoming increasingly rare. And we discover the talent of a carpenter consultant on heritage.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ça
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Laeti has a phobia of dogs. When she finds herself face to face with a dog and panics, Api comes to her aid.

programme.title: Mystery Lane
programme.desc: Clever and Bro, two little hamsters, live in a pet shop. She's the big sister, funny and incredibly intelligent; he's her cute little brother, sometimes grumpy, always brave. In their consulting rooms in the shop's basement, they confront the supernatural as they help London's animals solve some very strange goings-on!

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Isabelle cooks a steak that she serves with a miso butter flavoured with jalapeno and green onions, plus crushed potatoes served on a salt and vinegar mayonnaise.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc: The body of a man dressed as a pirate is found on the beach. He visibly died by drowning, wrists and ankles tied. Had he been made to walk the plant? Paul and Léa discover that he'd been given the famous black spot, as in the adventure story ''Treasure Island''.

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc: William Martel, owner of an aerodrome, is found dead in his office, hit over the head by one of the cups he'd won for aerial acrobatics. Léa wonders about the victim' timetable, why had he lied to those around him. Is the murder linked to the disappearance of his glider?

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Géopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Géopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: La Bataille Du Rail
programme.desc: During the Second World War, many French railway workers took part in the resistance. Daily acts of sabotage, spectacular derailments: the French railway network took many actions against Nazi occupation. A station manager, Camargue, and his deputy, Athos, risk their lives in managing the network in their sector.

programme.title: L'Attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Céline are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Céline meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.desc: Who can beat Sheep in the 400 metres hurdles, when he sends everyone watching to sleep?

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy, Les Infos Noisettes
programme.desc: How do bees make honey? What do mushrooms do at the foot of trees? Why is there always water running in the river? Edmond and Lucy try to discover the fascinating world around them thanks to Edouard and his encyclopaedia.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Marie leaves Vic the job of welcoming Rosalie, a new student, but Vic, obsessed by her popularity, tries to turn it to her own advantage. Flavie has to return the school guinea pig she's been looking after, but it's escaped.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Mission Info
programme.desc: News programme aimed at 7 to 11-year-olds! Each episode, devised for children and their parents, provides insight accessible to younger ones, combined with explanations, immersive reports and expert interviews. An educational quiz also gives children the chance to test their knowledge in a fun way.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Les Clubs

programme.title: 7 Jours

programme.desc: The origin of the woman called BISHOP! Why does she hate mutants? What is the secret of the Mechazoids? And exactly what happened the night the Turtles fell into Bishop's trap?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes he's developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When the circus comes to town and steals his customers away, Mr. Krabs tries to sabotage the show. // Sandy spends the day solving everyone's issues, only to return home to her own monster of a problem.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Strange things start to happen to Bose when he finds himself in love with an alien.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Jasper’s enthusiasm in crime fighting leads him to send Captain Man and Kid Danger into incidents that are not crimes. So when he is falsely accused of a burglary and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must find a way to set him free.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde decide to go see a Rip Hardcore taping but, causes Rip to lose his job. Guilt-ridden, Lincoln invites Rip to live at the Loud House until he can get back on his feet.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he won't leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln becomes Luan's clown assistant but starts hogging the spotlight. // The Loud kids set out to show Lisa what is 'fun' about a snow day.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel tries to make Pudding Day at school fair for everyone, she accidentally starts a pudding apocalypse. // When Hazel wishes her hair had "spirit" for a school contest, she finds it has more personality than she bargained for!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 2
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 12
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 19
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 4
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 5
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.
